4 AI tools I use every day that arenâ€™t ChatGPT:

1/ Wispr Flow (wisprflow.ai)

- Turns your voice into text, faster than typing.
- Get into flow state & write without stopping.
- Replaces: my keyboard. Type with your voice.
- Free plan available for everyone.

2/ Perplexity (perplexity.ai)

- Smarter than Google for research and answers.
- Summarizes sources, finds trends. Fast results.
- Great for market research or quick facts.
- Free plan covers most needs.

3/ Gamma (gamma.app)

- ChatGPT meets PowerPoint.
- Prompt slides for pitches, reports or websites.
- No design skills needed, just type and design.
- Free plan lets you try it out with no commitment.

4/ Claude (claude.ai)

- Writes in your style, not just AI text.
- Drafts emails, blog, & docs that sound like you.
- Handles long docs & keeps your style consistent.
- Free to start, easy to use.

This is my $0 creative stack. No ChatGPT needed. 

Just fast, smart, and free tools that get work done.
